apis.name: Petstore
apis.desc: This is a sample Petstore server. You can find out more about Swagger at [http://swagger.io](http://swagger.io).

apis.name: Petstore OAuth
apis.desc: This is a sample Petstore server secured via OAuth 2.0 Client Credentials flow.

apis.name: taxofficeinfo
apis.desc: API that provides infomation about German Tax Offices. The taxoffice API is a readonly API. It provides a list of tax offices (Finanz√§mter) and their addresses.

apis.name: exchangerate
apis.desc: API that provides infomation about exchange rates. The exchange rates API is a readonly API. It provides a list of exchange rates.
